item.title: Books
item.description: My latest book is out! You can buy them at the following places: Amazon (India, ebook) NotionPress paperback Pothi paperback Amazon (US, ebook and paperback) Amazon (UK, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Germany, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Australia, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Canada, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Netherlands, ebook and paperback) Amazon (Poland, ebook and paperback) Book Resources
